trans-unit.source: Represents the child controls of containers that support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa os controles filho dos contêineres que oferecem suporte a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This control pattern is analogous to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> with the distinction that any control supporting TableItemPattern will programmatically expose the relationship between the individual cell and its row and column information.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão de controle é análogo a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>com a diferença que qualquer controle TableItemPattern suporte será programaticamente expor a relação entre a célula individual e suas informações de linha e coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>

trans-unit.source: Access to individual cell functionality is provided by the additional support of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: O acesso à funcionalidade das células individuais é fornecido pelo suporte adicional de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de propriedade em cache para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade, obtenha a propriedade usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está no cache.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that retrieves all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade que recupera todos os cabeçalhos de coluna associados a um item de tabela ou célula.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não está presente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>e deve ser recuperada usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores da propriedade atual para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que foi previamente especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade atuais.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref> padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that retrieves all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade que recupera todos os cabeçalhos de linha associados a um item de tabela ou célula.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não está presente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>e deve ser recuperada usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
